Thanksgiving was always a big gathering in our family. The holiday brought in family from Texas, Arkansas, and Kansas. That meant LOTS of planning over who would bring what, how much, and so on.

One year, Aunt Max, my mother’s oldest sister, volunteered to bring the turkey. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKerkhdU4AALZdQ.jpg

Aunt Max was funny and quick-talking. She never took anything too seriously, including time. And she wasn’t much of a cook, so the other sisters made sure that she was up to the task—peppering her with questions, making sure she'd get a big enough turkey.

40 million people go hungry in America each year. Among children, in the richest country on Earth, how outrageous is it that 1 in 5 will go hungry this year? They burst through the front door, and Uncle Crowbar banged the heavy roaster on the kitchen countertop as people crowded around to see the turkey. With a flourish, Aunt Max lifted the lid, proclaiming, “Biggest Turkey Ever!”

Everyone jumped back. It was RAW.

An uproar followed as everyone loudly explained that “bring the turkey” meant a cooked turkey. Aunt Max considered that, then laughed. She said we'd eat Thanksgiving dinner in layers—a Jell-O course, a potato course, a pie course—finishing with a turkey course, in about 6 hours.
Todo tiene un precio.  Y una sociedad injusta es más cara que en una sociedad que invierte & valora a todas las personas.
Estén pendientes de los políticos que se autodenominan “responsables fiscales,” pero solo suelen estar preocupados por el precio de la justicia – no por el costo de la opresión.

Ninguno de ellos preguntan como vamos a pagar por contratos corruptos o la encarcelación masiva.

Pregúntate porque es eso.
Ninguno de los políticos que se autodenominan “responsables fiscales” muestran preocupación sobre el apresurarse a duchar a ICE & CBP con billones de $ o con 0 vallas de contención o supervisión.
Yo veo decisiones hechas cada día que cuestan billones de dólares al año al público Americano por razones falsas y nadie pregunta como lo pagaremos.
Esta es honestamente una de las grandes razones por la cual los argumentos de “quien lo pagará” cuando se trata de la salud, la vivienda, etc. son frecuentemente hechos de mala fe.
Y aún así nos llaman radicales por oponerlo.

Previamente este año, el Congreso se apresuró a aprobar BILLONES más de $ para ICE + CBP.

Vi a miembros votar SÍ sin siquiera un resumen del proyecto de ley.  A nadie le importó como lo íbamos a pagar.

Ahora ICE está creando universidades falsas para atrapar a estudiantes.

Abolir ICE https://twitter.com/LisPower1/status/1199705445792931840 QT @LisPower1 This story is WILD

ICE created a fake university, then: 

- enticed foreign-born students to attend
- charged them money 
- arrested them
- deported them 

Students had come legally on student visas, but since the school was fake the visas weren't valid https://www.freep.com/story/news/local/michigan/2019/11/27/ice-arrested-250-foreign-students-fake-university-metro-detroit/4277686002/
